headline: Carrier Japan's Universal Smart X Heat Pump Recognized by WIPO as Leading Energy Solution in Special Edition of Green Technology Book
summary: Carrier Japan's air-cooled modular chiller / heat pump Universal Smart X (USX) series has been included in the EXPO 2025 Special Edition of the Green Technology Book. Published by World Intellectual Property Organization (WIPO), the prestigious recognition was unveiled at EXPO 2025 Osaka, showcasing over 200 impactful energy innovations from the Asia Pacific region and highlighting technologies that contribute to a more sustainable future.
